message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's flip the script!  I think 60-40 is fair, but in my favor this time.
You wanted 60-40, I'll give you 39-61, considering the inflation, it's a better deal for you than the previous round
Let's be reasonable and split the money evenly.  Inflation is hurting both of us, and this way we both get a decent share.
Considering the inflation, your 50-50 offer is actually around 57-43 in my favor, I'll give you a 'better' deal
I'm willing to concede a bit more to end this, 60-40 in your favor.  Inflation is really hurting me, but I'd rather see something than nothing.
